results.deck: A Naval Simulator with a significant action tilt and slightly arcadey gameplay, bearing similarities to flight sims for the ease of movement and vehicle-based shooters for rapidity of fire. More comical than many naval games for the story.
results.name: Sub Rebellion

results.deck: KIRAKIRA is an adult visual novel about a group of students at a missionary school who decided to start a punk rock band.
results.name: KIRAKIRA

results.deck: Island Xtreme Stunts is the third Lego Island game. It is a mission-based stunt driving game, centered around an open world hub. It is unknown why the word "Lego" was dropped from the title.

results.deck: Minigames with your favorite characters from the Nickelodeon show.
results.name: Ni Hao, Kai-Lan: Super Game Day

results.deck: Jurassic: The Hunted is a sci-fi first-person shooter developed by Cauldron in which you travel back in time using 13 different weapons to survive 12 levels of dino shooting action. It's up to Dylan to figure out what the foxtrot is going on in the Bermuda Triangle.
results.name: Jurassic: The Hunted

results.deck: Caveman Rock was a puzzle game designed for PlayStation 2, Wii, Nintendo DS, and PC. Only the PS2 version was ever released.

results.deck: Sony's award-winning baseball franchise returns for the 2010 season with another installment of The Show. New features including Road to The Show Version 4.0 now enabling you to call the game as a catcher as well as the return of the Home Run Derby.
